data.eml:eml: Krobia xinguensis, a new species of cichlid fish from the Xingu River drainage in Brazil (Teleostei: Cichlidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kullander, Sven O. (2012): Krobia xinguensis, a new species of cichlid fish from the Xingu River drainage in Brazil (Teleostei: Cichlidae). Zootaxa 3197: 43-54, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.214913
